title: Mutually Exclusive Definition
text: A and B are mutually exclusive events if they cannot occur at the same time. This means that A and B do not share any outcomes and P(A AND B) $$=$$ 0.

title: Calculating Probabilities
text: What is the probability of our situation occurring?

title: Answer
text: Since P(A and B) $$=$$ 0, is this situation mutually exclusive or not?
